modName: Raubritter - Robber Knight Partial Plate Armour
summary:
This is the first show case of some armour which will be available in the mod "It's Me The King".
Here is a partial plate armour worn by some rich robber knights of New High Rock.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description[/b][/u]
This is the first show case of some armour which will be available in the mod "It's Me The King".
Here is a partial plate armour worn by some rich robber knights of New High Rock.

[u][b]Permissions :[/b][/u]
This is a nexus exclusive, DO NOT upload this mod anywhere else. This armour belongs to the mod "It's Me The King", you are NOT allowed to use it in your own mods. Translations are allowed.

[b][u]Request[/u][/b]
If you have requests or anything else to say about it, feel free to send me a private message, and I will answer. If you wan't to report a bug, please use the comment section.

[u][b]Location :[/b][/u]
It can be crafted provided you unlocked the advanced smithing perk. It requires steel, iron, gold,Â corundum, leather, leather strips and linnen.

[u][b]Credit :[/b][/u]
Bethesda for creating Skyrim,
CD Projekt Red for creating The Witcher 2 and allowing the skyrim community to use their game assets,
Armour made by myself in 3ds max using existing parts from The Witcher 2,
Helmet made by Nik000 using Zbrush, maya, 3D coat and dDO,
Textures are high quality 2K and 4K, made by me in Photoshop.

Best,
Erwan and Nicolas,
author: nicolas aka Nik000 and Erwan aka TheMedievalsKnights
